programme.title: It's Always Sunny In Philadelphia Yr 16
programme.desc: The Gang goes to "Risk E. Rat's", their childhood version of Chuck E. Cheese, only to find all the riskiness that made it exciting has been systematically replaced with safety and overcautiousness. Dennis and Charlie try to find the old ride with the animatronic boobs. Dee takes Frank on a scavenger to find jokes hidden throughout the establishment. Mac plays Skee-Ball to win tickets for a prize.

programme.title: The Mekong River With Sue Perkins
programme.desc: In this third episode, Sue reaches Laos, one of the poorest and least developed of all the Mekong nations. It's a country shaped by both Buddhism and Communism, and has hardly changed for centuries. Today, the beauty of its landscapes and people is bringing in foreign tourists - backpackers in search of un-spoilt Asia. Sue spends time with Bounsom, a fisherman who's turned to tourism, setting up a restaurant on the beach.

programme.title: 5-Headed Shark Attack
programme.desc: Shaped like a demented starfish, a monster 5-headed shark terrorizes the open ocean before invading the beaches of Puerto Rico, endangering the once peaceful island paradise.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends
programme.desc: This heart-warming and fascinating series brings you the most surprising animal friends from around the world. We travel the globe to track down the cutest, funniest and most unusual animal relationships and bring you the delightful and compelling stories behind these bizarre animal bonds.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons
programme.desc: As fall sweeps across America and trees are set ablaze with colour, animals are faced with make-or-break decisions. Find out how bald eagles, beavers, and other creatures prepare for the colder, darker, and leaner months ahead.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst Surge [S5]
programme.desc: (Dual Language - English and Malay) A legend of legends, Valt Aoi hosts an exhibition match featuring a revolutionary class of Bey: "Lightning Beys". Inspired by the battle, two unknown brothers, Hyuga and Hikaru Hizashi, issue a challenge: armed with their solar Beys Hyperion and Helios, this unlikely duo is going to topple Beyblade's ruling elite.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S7
programme.desc: It's Sports Day at Ollipolis and the Triangle Alien Sister wants to look as cool as her idol, Katnis. To do that, she gets dressed in flashy designer outfits, but realizes too late that designer gear and sports don't really go together. The gang help her to realize that she can look cool without fancy clothes. Ollie is insecure when his cheese-and-tomato-based model volcano isn't as good as the other projects at the Science Fair.

programme.desc: Enjoy the best of Pinkfong's most loved songs and stories with all your favourite characters!

programme.desc: Catch a brand new segment called "Abby's Amazing Adventures". And look out for special appearances by celebrity guests like Whoopi Goldberg, Zooey Deschanel, Amanda Seyfried and Blake Lively.

programme.title: Mumfie
programme.desc: Mumfie tells the story of a friendly, optimistic elephant and his best friends---a flying pig named Pinkey and a color-changing jellyfish named Jelly Bean---as they find adventure in daily life.

programme.title: Counting With Paula S5
programme.desc: The lights in the playroom go out. Being in the dark is scary, but the children learn about a candle with an everlasting light! To retrieve it, they have to face their fears and enter the darkest cave ever! Maurice accidentally bends Redbeard's hook out of shape. The children help Redbeard find some rather unique replacement hooks but Redbeard is sceptical about how useful they actually are.

programme.title: Tangranimals
programme.desc: Young Geo explores Tangra-planet, an amazing place with geometrical landscapes, along with his friends the Tangranimals . These amusing creatures can link together like Tangram pieces, and thus create all sorts of vehicles, creatures and objects. With that power, plus a good measure of imagination, Geo and his friends are ready to meet any challenge!

programme.title: Moka's Fabulous Adventures
programme.desc: Moka, the King of the Savannah's son, a naive and reckless little crocodile, leaves home one day to go explore his vast kingdom. Cherry, a brave rhinoceros from the Royal Guard is sent along to insure his protection. But much to her despair, Moka's insatiable curiosity and impulsive behavior are constantly getting them into trouble!

programme.title: After Love
programme.desc: Ryan appeals to Skylar to tend to Derek's heart and to bring him out of his self-imposed darkness. He reveals that Skylar is his muse and he can't make contact with anyone else. The only who can see him is Skylar. And Ryan has no other way to reach out to Derek. Skylar agrees and tries to meet Derek constantly. Although she's more of an annoyance than help, she's tenacious enough to stick around Derek constantly that he has no choice but to spend time with her...

programme.title: Transplant S2
programme.desc: Bash helps his undocumented friend Khaled apply for asylum.

programme.title: Mobil 1 The Grid 2023
programme.desc: Offering a behind the scenes VIP pass to the world of motorsport, Mobil 1 The Grid delivers the most comprehensive coverage of 4 wheel racing on television. The series will focus on all the great race series along with unprecedented access to some of the sport's biggest teams and drivers.

programme.title: Animals Unleashed
programme.desc: Animals Unleashed is a user-generated content show that features the most unpredictable and hilarious animal clips from around the world. From the wild to the living room, each episode showcases animals at their most surprising, mischievous and outrageous! Each action-packed episode features the very best animal clips available packaged into related segments, features, or even games, all with highly-entertaining narration.

programme.title: New Amsterdam S1
programme.desc: Dr. Frome uncovers a patient's surprising past. Meanwhile Dr. Sharpe struggles treating an addicted mother and baby and Dr. Reynolds overcomes some bad news.

programme.title: Starstruck UK S1
programme.desc: Members of the public will be transformed into their most beloved music star for one night only. But they won't be alone as they will perform as trios who all share a love for their chosen star. One trio will face each other in the finale.

programme.title: The Wall UK S2
programme.desc: The Wall is a wildly unpredictable, fast and simple game show with huge cash sums on the line. Two players must work together to tackle the mammoth four-storey-high wall. Emotions run high as the pair's faith in one another is tested by unpredictable outcomes and ever-rising stakes. The rules are simple. If the players answer a trivia question correctly, the ball turns green as it falls randomly down the wall towards slots of varying cash amounts.

programme.title: Euromaxx
programme.desc: Euromaxx is a lifestyle magazine show which features images and stories that reflect the rich diversity of cultural life in Europe. It also provides an insight into Europe and the people who live there.

programme.title: Inside The Box With Jack Stein
programme.desc: Jack starts his journey at a magnificent 17th century country house on the Thames, where Polly shows him the old method for roasting beasts via firepit in the kitchen! He then shares his own, slightly more approachable oven roasted version of Beef & Yorkshire pudding back in Cornwall, before deciding that it is the perfect dish to serve in Cape Town.

programme.title: Famous Foodies
programme.desc: Famous Foodies tells you about what and where the celebrities eat, from healthy lifestyles to haute cuisine.

programme.title: Jo Frost: Nanny On Tour S1
programme.desc: Jo Frost is a parenting expert who's spent years teaching parents and kids how to get along better. programme.desc: 传说中有一个夜里会发光的杯子，谁要是得到它，谁就可以许三个愿望…… 天上世界，女娲娘娘降服千年蜈蚣精，以好善之德将小蜈蚣罩在杯中，并命小仙子杯仙负责看守，谁知杯仙误信蜈蚣精让它逃跑。女娲惩罚小仙子将杯子流入凡间，谁若有缘拾起，注水入杯中，便可成为杯仙的主人，并可提出三个愿望。杯仙必须待奉满一千个主人，方可考虑重新位列仙班。 从此，民间就流传一个传说：有一个夜里会发光的神杯能为人实现任何愿望….

programme.desc: 传说中有一个夜里会发光的杯子，谁要是得到它，谁就可以许三个愿望…… 天上世界，女娲娘娘降服千年蜈蚣精，以好善之德将小蜈蚣罩在杯中，并命小仙子杯仙负责看守，谁知杯仙误信蜈蚣精让它逃跑。女娲惩罚小仙子将杯子流入凡间，谁若有缘拾起，注水入杯中，便可成为杯仙的主人，并可提出三个愿望。杯仙必须待奉满一千个主人，方可考虑重新位列仙班。 从此，民间就流传一个传说：有一个夜里会发光的神杯能为人实现任何愿望….

programme.title: 哆啦A梦

programme.title: 历历在目
programme.desc: (重) 屠妖节是兴都教徒重要的传统节日，也称排灯节。每年的屠妖节，兴都教徒都会在家里点燃油灯，象征印度教里的"光明征服黑暗"。 从汉娜手绘、庙里祈福到逛市集，这一集，跟随主持人一同探索屠妖节背后的传统意义和习俗！.

programme.title: 环保特攻队
programme.desc: 千年前的《泗州志》留下预言，人与自然需要达成平衡，否则将引发一场毁灭世界的灾难。在灾难来临之前，必须分别找齐三个世界的三把钥匙，获得拯救世界的机会。但正如历史所证明的那样，人与自然的平衡并不是一件容易的事情。因为人类和动物总是会引发一些问题。无论他们是不是有意为之，但往往会过度开发，过度使用他们的环境，破坏精妙的生态平衡，并将这个世界送上毁灭的道路。幸运的是，骄傲勇敢的水精灵带领伙伴们组成了一支强大的环保特攻队。他们将勇敢地面对这场危机，并不惜一切代价拯救湿地世界，为后代保护好这个世界。.

programme.title: 星期二特写：人生下半场
programme.desc: (重) 人到中年，赚五位数的黎杏心大可继续持稳养家，公务员王俊耀本也能在工作中寻求丰富精彩。然而一个偶发事件使杏心质疑生命意义到底何在；俊耀也因为对环境问题关注，而渐渐不能独善其身。觉醒是一种挣扎，他们经历摸索、挫折，甚至担心对家人是否不负责任。抱着满腔疑惑又承受不容时光虚掷的压迫感，他们能做出什么决定？.
